import { useGetNotesQuery } from './notesApiSlice' import Note from './Note' import useAuth from '../../hooks/useAuth' import PulseLoader from 'react-spinners/PulseLoader' const NotesList = () => { const { username, isManager, isAdmin } = useAuth() const { data: notes, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error, } = useGetNotesQuery('notesList', { pollingInterval: 15000, refetchOnFocus: true, refetchOnMountOrArgChange: true, }) let content // if (isLoading) content = // if (isError) { content =

{error?.data?.message}

} // if (isSuccess) { const { ids, entities } = notes let filteredIds if (isManager || isAdmin) { filteredIds = [...ids] } else { filteredIds = ids.filter(noteId => entities[noteId].username === username) } const tableContent = ids?.length && filteredIds.map(noteId => ) content = ( {tableContent}
Username Created Updated Title Owner Edit
) } return content } export default NotesList
